market_entry.name: Pentaho Marketplace
market_entry.description: Pentaho Marketplace allows users to explore and test the plugins that are most relevant to them. This means high quality and useful plugins that users can use to get the most out of their business.
market_entry.author: Pentaho

market_entry.name: Pentaho Marketplace
market_entry.description: Pentaho Marketplace allows users to explore and test the plugins that are most relevant to them. This means high quality and useful plugins that users can use to get the most out of their business.
market_entry.author: Pentaho

market_entry.name: Community Dashboards Framework
market_entry.description: Community Dashboard Framework (CDF) is the engine that allows you to create friendly, powerful and fully featured Dashboards on top of the Pentaho Business Intelligence server.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Community Data Access
market_entry.description: Community Data Access (CDA) is a Pentaho plugin designed for accessing data with great flexibility. Born for overcoming some cons of the older implementation, CDA allows you to access any of the various Pentaho data sources.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Community Dashboard Editor
market_entry.description:
The Community Dashboard Editor (CDE) is the outcome of real-world needs: It was born to greatly simplify the creation, edition and rendering of dashboards.
CDE and the technology underneath (CDF, CDA and CCC) allows to develop and deploy dashboards in the Pentaho platform in a fast and effective way.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Community Graphics Generator
market_entry.description: The CGG (Community Graphics Generator) is a Pentaho Plugin that allows the user to export CCC/CDE charts as images, enabling the inclusion of CDE charts inside Pentaho reports. Quite simply, this plugin is able to render, on server-side, exactly the same chart that is rendered on the browser by CDE/CDF.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Pentaho Application Builder
market_entry.description: Pentaho Application Builder is a plugin creator instrument that sits on 2 major cornerstones of the Pentaho ecosystem: Ctools and PDI. Aiming to leverage as much as possible of our existing stack, anyone familiar with those tools will be able to build plugins.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Pentaho Repository Synchronizer
market_entry.description:
Pentaho Repository Synchronizer allows you to interact with the solution repository of Pentaho 5 by keeping the disk-based file structure synchronized with the Pentaho internal solution repository (JCR).

This is a pilot release, use at your own risk and report any issues / feedback back to Webdetails bug tracker
market_entry.author: Webdetails
market_entry.installation_notes: This plugin copies a version of libpensol.*.jar to the server's WEB-INF/lib. It's possible that on Windows boxes there's an error upgrading the repositorySynchronizer. If that happens, stop the server and delete the WEB-INF/lib/libpensol.* jar file(s)

market_entry.name: Community Startup Tabs
market_entry.description:
CST is the easiest way to define and implement the Pentaho startup tabs depending on the user that logs into the PUC (Pentaho User Console):
1) Provides an easier way to set different startup tabs for each user that logs into the PUC, based on its username or role; 2) Allows you to specify usernames or roles using regular expressions.
Ranging from a single institutional page to a list of dashboards or reports, among other contents, the tabs opened to each Pentaho User after logging into the PUC vary depending on the user preferences or his/her role in the company. Then why should we let Pentaho open always the same content for everyone?
Thanks to CST, the list of tabs opened right after the login can be automatically different, depending on the user profile.
A landing tab can optionally be presented, which can be used to any of the predefined list of tabs and each user's favorite files.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Community Launch Pad
market_entry.description: CLP (Community Launch Pad) is a new CTool Plugin that lists the contents of a folder in the Pentaho Repository (accessible via the Pentaho User Console), allowing for the selection and display of these contents.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Community Text Editor
market_entry.description: Community Text Editor (CTE) is a Pentaho plugin to edit the contents of a file (be it within the JCR repository, a mondrian schema, or from the file system) directly from the Pentaho User Console.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Community Data Validation
market_entry.description: In the words of one of the wise men who are still around: "Our business isn't displaying stats, ours is the confidence business". The system we created to instantly detect and report data related errors, CDV, is key to achieve absolute accuracy in the numbers our dashboards display.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Community Distributed Cache
market_entry.description: CDC stands for Community Distributed Cache and allows for high-performance, scalable and distributed memory clustering cache based on Hazelcast for both CDA and Mondrian.
market_entry.author: Webdetails
market_entry.installation_notes: Please remember to copy the contents of system/cdc/pentaho-lib to webapps/pentaho/WEB-INF/lib.

market_entry.name: Community File Repository
market_entry.description: CFR (Community File Repository) is a new CTool Plugin that allows you to setup and use a file repository from inside Pentaho. You can use it to manage your file needs, allowing uploads and downloads from inside your dashboards.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Startup Rule Engine
market_entry.description:
Application that allows the user to configure Kettle jobs and transformations to be run upon specific events, such as upon session login/logout or server startup.

Report here any issues or suggestions for improvement
market_entry.author: Webdetails
market_entry.installation_notes:
You can run the Startup Rule Engine as an administrator from the Tools menu.
After installation, you'll require two server restarts.
On the first server restart, the application will patch your installation and edit system files. It will also create the folder pentaho-solutions/system/startupRules and populate it with some sample jobs and transformations. Upon the second server restart, the Startup Rule Engine will be operational..

Report here any issues or suggestions for improvement

market_entry.name: D3 Component Library
market_entry.description: This project holds d3 components to be used in Pentaho, both on Analyzer and on CTools dashboards. The idea is to provide some helper functions that allows to quickly port examples from the d3 gallery page and implement them as components to be used in the Pentaho platform.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: BayInspect Plugin
market_entry.description:
BayInspect Plugin

Plugin for analyze Pentaho audit logs. BayInspect shows information of solutions deployed on the platform (reports, views, OLAP, dashboards, etc ..).

It represents runtimes and detail of the busiest periods of the platform, also allow to select on users who execute solutions to show graphs and tables with their information.
market_entry.author: Bahia Software

market_entry.name: Saiku Analytics
market_entry.description: Saiku is a modular open-source analysis suite offering lightweight OLAP which remains easily embeddable, extendable and configurable. Our RESTful server connects to existing OLAP systems, which then powers user-friendly, intuitive analytics via our lightweight JQuery based frontend.
market_entry.author: Meteorite BI
market_entry.installation_notes: Obtaining a license All versions of Saiku Analytics require a license to function. To download your EE trial license or Community Edition Free license please visit http://licensing.meteorite.bi

market_entry.name: Saiku Chart Plus
market_entry.description:
What is Saiku Chart Plus?

It is an open source project that helps Pentaho BI users to create other types of charts and maps based on Saiku Project, Highcharts and Google Maps.





Requirements
Uninstall your Saiku version and install Saiku version 3, this is really necessary!

Feel free to create a issue.
market_entry.author: IT4biz

market_entry.name: Pentaho CE Audit
market_entry.description:
What is Pentaho CE Audit Plugin?

It is an open source project that helps Pentaho BI Admin users to visualize statistics like:

  • Who is logging in the BI Portal (Pentaho BI Server)?
  • When are the users using the BI Portal?
  • What is the content with more access?
  • And a lot of others infos about the use of the BI Portal.

This plug-in will apply automatically an Environment configuration, if you want to know more about it please visit the link Pentaho InfoCenter.

For more information visit our site.

Feel free to create a issue.
market_entry.author: IT4biz
market_entry.installation_notes:
You can run the Pentaho CE Audit Installer as an administrator from the Tools menu. The installer will make some Environment configurations, requiring a reboot in the end.

Please note that if you upgrade Pentaho CE Audit, you will need to run the Pentaho CE Audit Installer again.

It is mandatory to click on the "Refresh Button" on the Pentaho CE Audit Admin Screen to get the most updated data.

market_entry.name: Pentaho Performance Monitoring
market_entry.description:
Pentaho Performance Monitoring Plugin

The plugin is an open source project that helps Pentaho BI Administrators visualize performance statistics.

Examples include:

  • The most frequently run MDX and SQL queries
  • Showing who uses the BI Portal most often
  • Measures for which queries take the longest time to execute
  • Many other statistics are captures and available as well as the examples above.

This plug-in will apply automatically an Environment configuration, if you want to know more about it please visit the link Github documentation.

For more information visit our site.

Feel free to create a issue.
market_entry.author: IT4biz
market_entry.installation_notes:
You can run the Pentaho Performance Monitoring Installer as an administrator from the Tools menu. The installer will make some Environment configurations, requiring a reboot in the end.

Please note that if you upgrade Pentaho Performance Monitoring, you will need to run the Pentaho Performance Monitoring Installer again.

It is mandatory to click on the "Refresh Button" on the Pentaho Performance Monitoring Admin Screen to get the most updated data.

After installation, you must restart your server twice for the plugin to work. Backup versions of your files are stored so that you can roll back. The files changed are: PUCLogin.jsp and applicationContext-spring-security.xml.
market_entry.name: Tapa
market_entry.description:
Tapa is the easiest way to change the appearance of your BI Server.

It's a non-invasive plugin that allows you to:
  • Quickly change your login page for one of our templates;
  • Customize text tags from the UI;
  • Upload images to the existing templates from the UI;
  • Place the logo of your company on the header of PUC;
  • Replace Pentaho's welcome page for your custom HTML page;
  • Develop your own template and keep it into one package;
  • Easily migrate your server's Tapa-like UI customizations;
  • Easily inject css/js files into User Console's ui contexts;

For demo video, repository and more documentation, please visit github.com/marpontes/tapa.
market_entry.author: Oncase

market_entry.name: IvyBC - Ivy Bootstrap Components (Free)
market_entry.description:
The Ivy BC is a suite of additional CDE Components that allow you to quickly and easily create responsive bootstrap dashboards. Each of these components comes with many options that allow you advanced control on their look and behaviour

Included Bootstrap Components - Free

  • Bootstrap Input New
  • Bootstrap Panel
  • Bootstrap Button

Samples & Documentation

The IvyBC Plugin also includes extensive component samples and coumentation that you can open in the CDE and edit as you like

IvyBC - Professional

We also offer a professional version of IvyBC that can be purchased from the Ivy IS Website. This version includes various other components and features

market_entry.name: Alflytics - The Alfresco analytics.
market_entry.description:
The Open Source Business Intelligence solution over the Alfresco platform.

With Alflytics is provided a solution to extract, store and analyze data from Alfresco with the goal to be useful to the end-user in a very easy way.
market_entry.author: Francesco Corti
market_entry.installation_notes: This plugin requires CDA and CDE installed in the Pentaho Analytics platform and has been developed using Sparkl. All the configurations, logs, sources and scripts are stored in the Alflytics folder.

version.name: Stable
version.description:
The Open Source Business Intelligence solution over the Alfresco platform.

With Alflytics is provided a solution to extract, store and analyze data from Alfresco with the goal to be useful to the end-user in a very easy way.
version.changelog: - Rebranding from A.A.A.R. to Alflytics. - Complete rewrite of the whole solution. - HyperSQL, PostgreSql and MySql support. - Multivalue properties support. - Support for categories and tags analytics. - Alfresco custom models support. - Does not require any installation or customization on Alfresco. - Supports Alfresco v5.2+. - Requires Pentaho Analytics platform 7.1.

market_entry.name: Alfresco Audit Analysis and Reporting
market_entry.description:
Plugin that allows you to install and use Alfresco Audit Analysis and Reporting (A.A.A.R.).

With A.A.A.R. is provided a solution to extract, store and analyze audit data together with the document/folder informations at a very detailed level, with the goal to be useful to the end-user in a very easy way.
market_entry.author: Francesco Corti
market_entry.installation_notes: This plugin requires CDA and CDE installed in the Pentaho BIServer and has been developed using Sparkl. All the configurations, logs, sources and scripts are stored in the AAAR folder.

Plugin that gives information about system and session environment information useful for development and debugging. Even though it's not sensitive information, it's not recommended to have this plugin installed in a production environment

market_entry.name: Pentaho Analytics Shell
market_entry.description: Pash is a shell interface to Pentaho Analysis. It provides command-line access to mondrian straight from within your webbrowser. The shell allows you to list the available mondrian catalogs, cubes, dimensions etc, and you can type and run ad-hoc MDX queries. After installation, the shell is available in the Tools menu
market_entry.author: Roland Bouman

market_entry.name: Fusion Charts Plugin
market_entry.description:
Pentaho FusionCharts plugin allows creating Killer Data Visualizations on Pentaho Business Analytics through a seamless integration with the FusionCharts library. The latest update includes access to real-time charts, widgets and maps all this optimized for mobile devices as well as many other exciting features. The plugin allows using FusionCharts on EE Dashboards, CDF, CDE and Analyzer.

Note: This plugin requires Pentaho version 5.0 or higher. To start using this plugin for free, you need to fill the form at the Xpand IT website and request your license. Once you get the key you just need to insert it on the Pentaho User Console through the menu entry "Tools" -> "FusionChartsManager" and start using Pentaho FusionCharts Plugin. For more information you can check the wiki.
market_entry.author: Xpand IT

market_entry.name: Bissol Table Data Editor
market_entry.description:
Bissol Table Data Editor

Warning: This plugin has only been tested on Postgresql and MariaDB. It is highly recommended that you do not use this plugin in production. This project is in the early stages and once we've received feedback from more users, we will classify this plugin as stable.

Intended Purpose of the Plugin

The Bissol Table Data Editor (BTDE) Pentaho BI Server Plugin allows you to update and add data to small database tables via an easy-to-use web-interface.

Example Use Cases:

  • Maintaining attribute fields in dimension tables. For some dimensions in a star schema you might ask end-users to add some additional information which is otherwise not available.
  • Maintaining custom configuration tables
  • Maintaining custom metadata tables

Note: The emphasis is on maintaining small tables. The definition of small is anything that fits on a standard screen, so ideally less than a hundred records.





For more information visit the Github project site.
Please report issues and improvement ideas on GitHub
market_entry.author: Diethard Steiner (Bissol Consulting Ltd)
market_entry.installation_notes: You must restart the biserver after installing this plugin, because on installation this plugin adds following Pentaho Kettle steps to the biserver Kettle folder: BAServerUtils and JDBC Metadata. Only after you restarted the biserver, these Kettle steps will be registered.

market_entry.name: SVG Component
market_entry.description: SVG Component is a CTools component that can be used to change SVG style atributes or text strings, according to values submitted by it's own datasource.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Viz-SVG kar
market_entry.description:
Set of visualizations created to illustrate Viz-API potentialities in conjunction with SVG images. This two technologies together allow you to create very specific visualizations that will be available on Pentaho Analyzer, CTools and Pentaho Data Integration (DET).

This installation will make available some custom visualizations: SVG Product Line, SVG Office, SVG Map and SVG Office. To imediatly see, test and validate you can open Pentaho Analyzer, select Steelwheels schema, and use SVG Product Line visualization (selecting Product Line and Sales from dimensions and Measures), or SVG Map (selecting any Market level and Sales measure).

To access and see the remain visualizations please install Viz-SVG Samples from Pentaho Markeplace.

For more reference and documentation about these visualizations, please go to Viz-SVG on github.
market_entry.author: Webdetails
market_entry.dependencies: CDE, CDF, CDA and Pentaho Analyzer

market_entry.name: Viz-SVG Samples
market_entry.description:
Viz-API samples to test and evaluate Viz-API kar visualizations that were not immediatly available after his installation (Car and Office visualizations).

After installing these samples you will be able to explore Office and Car visualizations, both on Analyzer and on CTools, and access CTools dashboards where these and the remaining visualizations are utilized.

To use it please observe the following steps:
  • Run the two jobs available under viz-svg-samples/ktrs
  • Those jobs will create two schemas that will allow you to use the associated visualizations, both on Analyzer and CTools
  • To use Car visualization on Analyzer you need to choose: Sensor for Rows, value for Measures, (you can use Year to filter the information)
  • To use Office visualization on Analyzer you need to choose: Room for Rows, light usage as measure (use Department dimension to filter the information)
  • After one of those configurations, to see the correspondent visualization, please choose SVG Office or SVG Car, under Analyzer visualization options


For more reference and documentation about these visualizations, please visit Viz-SVG on github.
market_entry.author: Webdetails
market_entry.dependencies: Viz-SVG kar, SVG Component, CDE, CDF, CDA and Pentaho Analyzer

market_entry.name: Apple Push Notification
market_entry.description: This is a plugin that allows to you send push notifications from Pentaho Data Integration to any iOS and OSX devices, using Apple's Push Notification Services. This plugin is written in Java and uses the Java Apple Push Notification Service library. The motivation for developing this plugin is to have you, the ETL developer, receive quick notifications about the state of ETL executions wherever you are (faster than email). However, this plugin can be use for other scenarios as well. Now is just for PDI 5.x or later.

You can use my android app named PDI Manager: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.latinojoel.pdimanager However, this plugin can be used in other scenarios as well. market_entry.name: DataCleaner Data Quality for Kettle
market_entry.description:
Use DataCleaner - the premier open source data quality solution - to profile, analyze, clean and deduplicate the data that you work with in Pentaho Data Integration.
DataCleaner provides strong functionality in the area of Data Profiling and Data Quality analysis. This includes discovering patterns and anomalies, standardizing data as well as detecting duplicate records.
With this plugin you can:
* Launch data profiling for any transformation step in PDI, effectively allowing you to inspect and discover the shape of data at any point in your transformation pipeline. * Apply DataCleaner to your database from the database explorer of PDI. This allows you to investigate the data at it's source. * Include and launch DataCleaner jobs as part of your PDI jobs. This allows you to merge the ongoing workflow of data quality and data integration.

market_entry.name: Melissa Contact Data Verify (Verification, Duplicate Identification, and Data Enhancement)
market_entry.description:
Achieve data quality effortlessly with our Melissa Contact Data Verify solution. This comprehensive bundle provides verification for global or North American addresses, names, phone numbers, and emails; duplicate identification, and adds IP location information to your data.

Contact Verify Component

Our Contact Verify Component can standardize, verify, and correct U.S. and Canadian addresses, phone numbers, names, and email addresses, to ensure your database contains accurate, trusted, and actionable information.

  • USPS© CASS™ and Canada Post SERP certified engine for increased accuracy
  • Add county and census information to gain better insights
  • Verify and normalize U.S. and Canadian phones on a 7-10 digit level to ensure numbers are live and callable
  • Parse names, genderize, and detect suspicious words or companies in name field to reduce fraud
  • Geocode addresses by assigning rooftop lat/long coordinates for enhanced location intelligence

Processing Options: Local, Cloud, Dedicated Cloud

SmartMover Component

This component provides change-of-address processing for U.S. and Canadian addresses. Stay in touch with businesses and consumers that have moved to eliminate the costs associated with undeliverable-as-addressed mail.

  • Match your customer records against the USPS full NCOALink™ data file of 160 million moves going back 48 months to update address data
  • Satisfy the USPS Move Update requirement to qualify for postal discounts
  • Match your address file against the Canada Post NCOA database containing over 11 million records for the last 72 months

Processing Options: Cloud

MatchUp Component

Duplicate records result in waste, inefficiencies and cloud your ability to gain a single, accurate view of the customer. MatchUp uses over 16 advanced fuzzy matching algorithms and deep domain knowledge to find even the hardest-to-detect U.S. and international duplicate records.

  • Identify duplicate records with domain specific knowledge of contact information to eliminate clutter
  • Match records even with data inconsistencies to increase database accuracy
  • Allow users to define, customize, and cascade powerful match codes
  • Consolidate duplicates and identify the "Golden Record" using survivorship techniques for a single, accurate view of the customer
  • Identify and consolidate records that are members of the same household to eliminate multiple mailings

Processing Options: Local

IP Locator Component

Identify where your web visitors are coming from very useful for e-commerce sites looking to prepopulate country code on forms, display a different language, filter access from countries you dont do business with, and/or reduce credit card fraud based on geographic location.

  • Access the geographic location of an Internet Protocol (IP) address, including latitude, longitude, city, state, ZIP Code/Postal Code, region
  • Append Latitude, longitude, ISP, City, State, Country to geotarget and analyze traffic for enhanced sales

Processing Options: Cloud, Local, Dedicated Cloud

Support

  • Works on PDI Servers, Clusters, and in Hadoop
  • Only Available in Pentaho Enterprise Edition
  • All Enterprise Components are professionally supported by Melissa
  • For Infomation or Tutorials please visit our wiki
  • To obtain technical support on this plugin, contact Melissa Technical Support at 1-800-635-4772 x4 or email tech@melissadata.com

License

  • To obtain a Melissa license please visit Melissa or call 1-800-635-4772

market_entry.name: Melissa Global Contact Data Verify
market_entry.description:
Did you know that there are over 247 countries and territories in the world, with 131 different address formats? Some countries dont have an established set of postal rules, while most countries do not follow the U.S. standard of street address, city, state, and ZIP Code. This can be a big, and costly concern for companies shipping across borders. Melissas Global Data Verification solution for Pentaho can help standardize your global database into a consistent, accurate format.

Global Contact Data Verify Component

Clean, verify, standardize, and format all of your global People Data name, address, email, and phone to ensure your international database contains the most accurate, trustworthy information.

  • Verify and correct postal addresses for over 240 countries
  • Correct international addresses by adding missing components like postal codes, region, etc.
  • Standardize addresses to meet local country formatting rules
  • Transliterate many popular native character sets into Latin
  • Add precise lat/long coordinates to addresses for 40+ countries
  • Verify email addresses to the box level in real-time; email syntax and domain correction
  • Verify phone numbers in real-time; distinguish between global landlines and mobile numbers
  • Parse names with country specific rulesets

Processing Options: Cloud, Local, Hybrid (allowing you to choose which countries get sent to the cloud, and which go local)

Support

  • Works on PDI Servers, Clusters, and in Hadoop
  • Only Available in Pentaho Enterprise Edition
  • All Enterprise Components are professionally supported by Melissa
  • For Infomation or Tutorials please visit our wiki
  • To obtain technical support on this plugin, contact Melissa Technical Support at 1-800-635-4772 x4 or email tech@melissadata.com

License

market_entry.name: Melissa ID Verify, Complete & Enrich
market_entry.description:
Is your customer truly who they say they are? Our Melissa ID Verify solution can help authenticate their identity by validating each contact data element, and matching name-to-address to prevent fraud and meet compliance.

Personator Component

The Personator Component taps a multisource dataset containing billions of records to validate each element of a contact record name, address, phone, and/or email and match name-to-address to verify true identity.

  • Fill in missing contact information like business/consumer emails, addresses, phones, and names to complete your contact data
  • Add current addresses for customers and prospects that have moved in the U.S. and Canada matching your records against a proprietary database of address changes going back 20+ years
  • Append detailed consumer demographics including marital status, date of birth, gender, presence of children, occupation, income, and more for deeper customer insights
  • Add lat/long coordinates at the rooftop level for 95% of U.S. addresses, along with county and census data, and Core Based Statistical Area (CBSA) and Metropolitan/Micropolitan areas for location intelligence

Processing Options: Cloud

Support

  • Works on PDI Servers, Clusters, and in Hadoop
  • Only Available in Pentaho Enterprise Edition
  • All Enterprise Components are professionally supported by Melissa
  • For Infomation or Tutorials please visit our wiki

market_entry.name: Melissa Profiler
market_entry.description:
Imagine taking a statistical analysis snapshot of your data to quickly see where the problems are. Thats what Melissas Profiler does. Data profiling is a critical first step for data modeling, data quality, and master data management initiatives to help ensure the consistency of reference data. Profiling helps identify data inconsistencies before its used for reporting and business intelligence purposes.

Profiler Component

Generate simple-to-advanced profiling information, including basic data statistics (mean, median, frequency, variation, etc.) and details (structure, content, classifications, etc.) to identify data errors at their source.

  • Support building a target schema dynamically with sizes, nulls, unique counts, length, and field identification
  • Over 100 column and table level metrics
  • Profile for nulls, blanks and patterns
  • Allow regexes and error thresholds to be set for monitoring
  • Utilize sophisticated matching to output fuzzy and exact match counts

Processing Options: Local

Support

  • Works on PDI Servers, Clusters, and in Hadoop

Access variables from over 165 fields in categories such as: parcel, property address; owner; owner mail address; property values; current sale and trust deed; prior sale; lot/land square footage, and more. Ideal for developers, risk management, real estate professionals, investors, and more.

market_entry.name: Melissa BusinessCoder
market_entry.description:
Get the full picture of your B2B clients and prospects with Melissa BusinessCoder. Our firmographic append solution easily verifies, standardizes and enriches your business records with 30 unique data elements from 25 million business across the U.S.

BusinessCoder Component

This component helps you resolve business entities for standardization and record consolidation, plus it provides a wealth of fundamental characteristics about a business that can be utilized for decision making, lead scoring and optimized B2B marketing and sales efforts.

  • Add comprehensive firmographics from more than 25 million businesses for better insight and analytics
  • Update outdated contact information to improve customer retention and prevent lost opportunities
  • Standardize business names and acronyms (TWC Time Warner Cable) to prevent duplicate accounts
  • Discover valuable characteristics including SIC/NAICS, sales volume, number of employees and more for deeper segmentation
  • Search for businesses using phone number, stock ticker, web address and more to find ideal prospects

Processing Options: Cloud

Support

  • Works on PDI Servers, Clusters, and in Hadoop
  • Only Available in Pentaho Enterprise Edition
  • All Enterprise Components are professionally supported by Melissa
  • For Infomation or Tutorials please visit our wiki
  • To obtain technical support on this plugin, contact Melissa Technical Support at 1-800-635-4772 x4 or email tech@melissadata.com

License

  • To obtain a Melissa license please visit Melissa or call 1-800-635-4772

market_entry.name: Melissa General Cleanser
market_entry.description:
Eliminate errors and fix inconsistencies within databases with Melissa Data Quality Cleanser. Our data quality cleansing tool gives data stewards the ability to standardize and validate inventory lists to better prep and cleanse data prior to analysis.

Generalized Cleansing Component

Build your own data cleansing scripts that cleans, standardizes, and reformats any data type. Change casing or capitalization, add or remove punctuation, expand or contract abbreviations, and search then replace any parts of a string for clean and useful data.

  • Cleanse any type of data and achieve a higher standard of data quality for integration, warehousing and analytics
  • Gain greater control of your data when optimized, saving your business time, money and resources
  • Customize and create simple or complex rules to standardize data, and then save for future use and convenience

Processing Options: Local

Support

  • Works on PDI Servers, Clusters, and in Hadoop
  • Only Available in Pentaho Enterprise Edition
  • All Enterprise Components are professionally supported by Melissa
  • For Infomation or Tutorials please visit our wiki
  • To obtain technical support on this plugin, contact Melissa Technical Support at 1-800-635-4772 x4 or email tech@melissadata.com

market_entry.name: JaRE - Java Rule Engine
market_entry.description:
Check data against rules defined in an external file. The advantage being that the logic is not defined in the transformation but externally. If the logic changes, then the transformation does not need to be touched.
Having the rules outside the ETL process in a central location is more transparent for the users and the ETL process is cleaner.
There is a web application available for the maintenance of the rule logic in the form of projects.
Rules are defined in groups and subgroups allowing to combine them with flexible and/or conditions. So a group may pass the check even though some of the rules might have failed. You have optimum flexibility to define your simple or komplex logic.
The rule engine also allows for actions depending on the result of the business rules. These actions may update fields, calculate values or do other modifications.
Detailed documentation on the rule engine: https://github.com/uwegeercken/rule_maintenance_documentation
Find source code and files on github.com/uwegeercken
market_entry.author: Uwe Geercken / Datamelt

market_entry.name: Probabilistic Row Distributions for PDI
market_entry.description:
This is a collection of Row Distribution plugins for PDI that use probabilistic methods for determining the distribution of rows. The collection currently includes:
- Uniformly random: Distributes rows to each target step with equal probability. For example, if you distribute from a step to 4 target steps, then each row has a 25% chance of being sent to a particular target step.
- Markov chains: Distributes rows based on a specification file that assigns probabilities to hops. For example, the markov_hops.txt file in the plugin specifies probabilities from a Generate Zeroes step to calculator steps with varying probabilities. Note that the sum of probabilities for all hops from a step must equal 1.0.
These can be used to perform random walks of transformations. This is intended to aid in the use of PDI as a graphical tool for statistical analysis.

market_entry.name: Parquet Output Plugin
market_entry.description:
The Parquet Plugin for Pentaho Data Integration allows you to output Parquet files using Kettle. Parquet files are a columnar oriented file format commonly used in Hadoop. Using Parquet files in Hadoop as opposed to CSV files can produce orders of magnitude compression and query performance improvement.
This Plugin is tightly integrated with Hadoop. It is recommended this plugin only be used when writing to files in HDFS.
Additional installation steps available in the README must be followed in order for this plugin to work. https://github.com/inquidia/ParquetPlugin/blob/master/README.md/
market_entry.author: Inquidia Consulting
market_entry.installation_notes:
Pentaho currently does not provide a mechanism allowing for plugin steps to be dependent on the Pentaho Big Data Plugin shims. Due to this, the following steps must be followed to use this plugin.
1. Copy the following files from the data-integration/plugins/pentaho-big-data-plugin/hadoop-configurations/{environment}/lib/client folder to the data-integration/lib folder. 1.1. commons-cli.jar 1.2. commons-configuration.jar 1.3. hadoop*.jar 1.4. protobuf-java.jar 2. It is recommended you copy your Hadoop configuration files (hdfs-site.xml, core-site.xml, etc.) to the data-integration folder. 3. Restart PDI

Includes three easy to use Analyzer visualizations that allow you to run machine learning algorithms in Weka. The following algorithms are included:

  • Decision Tree - Use this classification algorithm to find rules that predict an outcome.
  • Clustering - Find similiar groups of instances and optionally test against a desired outcome.
  • Attribute Selection - Identify which attributes are most predictive for an outcome.

This plugin adds visualizations to Analyzer and thus requires Pentaho Enterprise Edition.

market_entry.name: Ruby scripting
market_entry.description:
This plugin provides a ruby scripting step similar to the javascript and user defined java class steps.

A comprehensive set of samples is available in the step dialog.

The implementation is based on JRuby. Thanks to JRuby's Java interop, the scripting step also enables easy Java scripting in kettle.

The source code is available at https://github.com/twineworks/ruby-for-pentaho-kettle.

Supported versions of PDI

The plugin is built and tested against the most recent versions of PDI 5.x, 6.x and 7.x.

Features at a glance

  • rows are represented as hashes, indexed by field name
  • automatic conversion between all kettle data types and ruby types
  • steps with no input can be used as row generators
  • can redirect rows to an error handling stream
  • can read from specific info steps
  • can write to specific target steps
  • can call your favorite Java libraries
  • can use ruby gems
  • kettle's step $step and transformation $trans objects are available in ruby scope for advanced scripting
market_entry.author: Twineworks GmbH
market_entry.support_message: To obtain commercial support for this plugin, contact Twineworks GmbH at support@twineworks.com
